info.title: Microsoft HorizonDb Management API
info.description: Azure Resource Provider API for managing HorizonDb clusters, pools, replicas, and firewall rules

get.description: List the operations for the provider

CreateModeCluster.description: The mode to create a new HorizonDb cluster

CreateModePool.description: The mode to create a new HorizonDb cluster

mode.description: The HA mode for the server

state.description: The user visible HA state of the server

standbyAvailabilityZone.description: The availability zone of the standby server

fullyQualifiedStandbyDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of the standby server

HighAvailabilityMode.description: Modes of high availability supported for this compute.

HorizonDbCluster.description: Concrete tracked resource types can be created by aliasing this type using a specific property type.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

HorizonDbClusterForUpdate.description: Represents a HorizonDb cluster resource for update operations

properties.description: The properties of the cluster for update

HorizonDbClusterListResult.description: The response of a HorizonDbCluster list operation.

value.description: The HorizonDbCluster items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

version.description: The version of the Orion Db

createMode.description: The mode to create a new HorizonDb cluster

pointInTimeUTC.description: Restore point creation time (ISO8601 format), specifying the time to restore from

sourceOrionDbResourceId.description: The source HorizonDb cluster resource identifier for read replica or point in time restore scenarios

poolName.description: The pool name for restore or replica operations

availabilityZone.description: The availability zone of the Orion Db

processorType.description: The processor type for the Orion Db cluster

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of the cluster

readonlyEndpoint.description: The fully qualified domain name used for readonly endpoint for the cluster

earliestRestoreDate.description: The earliest restore point time (ISO8601 format) for the cluster

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the cluster

HorizonDbClusterPropertiesForUpdate.description: Properties of a HorizonDb cluster for update operations

HorizonDbFirewallRule.description: Concrete proxy resource types can be created by aliasing this type using a specific property type.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

HorizonDbFirewallRuleProperties.description: Properties of a HorizonDb firewall rule

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address of the firewall rule

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address of the firewall rule

description.description: The description of the OrionDb firewall rule

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the firewall rule

HorizonDbPool.description: Concrete proxy resource types can be created by aliasing this type using a specific property type.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

HorizonDbPoolForUpdate.description: Represents a HorizonDb pool resource for update operations

properties.description: The properties of the pool for update

sku.description: The SKU for the OrionDb pool

location.description: The location of the OrionDb pool

replicaCount.description: Number of replicas in the pool

administratorLogin.description: The administrator login for the pool

administratorLoginPassword.description: The administrator login password for the pool

version.description: The version of the OrionDb pool

tags.description: The tags for the OrionDb pool

createMode.description: The create mode for the pool

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the pool

HorizonDbPoolPropertiesForUpdate.description: Properties of a HorizonDb pool for update operations

replicaCount.description: Number of replicas in the pool

HorizonDbReplica.description: Concrete proxy resource types can be created by aliasing this type using a specific property type.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

isPrimary.description: Boolean indicating if this is the primary replica

fullyQualifiedDomainName.description: The fully qualified domain name of the replica

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the replica

customWindow.description: Indicates whether the window is customer or system default

dayOfWeek.description: The day of the week for the maintenance to occur (0-6, where 0 is Sunday)

startHour.description: The hour to start the maintenance (0-23)

startMinute.description: The minute to start the maintenance (0-59)

publicNetworkAccess.description: The flag indicating whether public ip is requested for the server

delegatedSubnetResourceId.description: The customer provided delegated subnet full ARM resource ID

privateDnsZoneArmResourceId.description: The customer provided private DNS zone full ARM resource ID
